title: Purse, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: beaded crochet
description: Small purse of white silk crocheted net with clusters of steel beads. Ring of cut steel to close. Top finished with two small bars, steel chain.

tombstone.epitaph:
Purse, early 19th century.Medium: silk, metal
Technique: beaded crochet. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-20.
